Name: Raal Dromedary
Type sentence: An Ordinary and superbly indifferent Beast.
Flavor:
"And a coarse grace remained: his head was high,
Though his gaunt flanks with a great mange were worn:
There was not any yearning in his eye,
But on his lips and nostril infinite scorn."

- Archibald Young Campbell

Name: Beast of Burden
Card Text: This Beast may carry an ally as it moves.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Beast bears the wide world.
Flavor: Existence and hardship are one and the same.

Name: Ogre Goons
Card Text: These Ogres can only attack weaker minions.
Type sentence: These Ordinary Monsters are out of control.

Name: Black Scorpions
Card Text: Lethal
Type sentence: Ordinary Beasts who scour by sting.
Flavor: They wait and watch with eyes of soot.

Name: Rattlesnakes
Card Text: Burrowing, Lethal
Type sentence: Ordinary Beasts slither and rattle here.
Flavor: Don't tread on me.

Name: Sacred Scarabs
Card Text:
Airborne

When these Scarabs die, they deal 3 damage to all units on their site.
Type sentence: Ordinary Beasts of eruptive retribution.

Name: Rimland Nomads
Card Text:
Movement +1

These Nomads take 1 less Fire damage.
Type sentence: Ordinary Mortals on an endless journey.
Flavor: Just put one foot in front of the other.

Name: Sand Worm
Card Text:
Burrowing, Firebound

This Worm can move while burrowed.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Beast senses vibration here.

Name: Tomb Mummies
Card Text:
Can and must be summoned burrowed under any site.

Unburrow them when an enemy enters their site.
Type sentence: Ordinary Undead emerge from below.

Name: Petrosian Cavalry
Card Text: Haste
Type sentence: Ordinary Mortals appear out of the haze.
Flavor:
Swift steeds and swifter swords.
The tide of battle has turned!

Name: Cauldron Crones
Card Text: Spellcaster
Type sentence: Ordinary Mortals brewing with ill intent.
Flavor: Double, double toil and trouble; Fire burn and cauldron bubble. -William Shakespeare, Song of the Witches

Name: Azuridge Caravan
Card Text: Occupies two sites.
Type sentence: An Ordinary array of Mortals and Beasts.
Flavor: Safety in numbers.

Name: Vile Imp
Card Text: Genesis → Deals 2 damage to another adjacent unit.
Type sentence: An Ordinary firestarter of a Demon.
Flavor: In the utter darkness they will burn you just to see the light.

Name: Tvinnax Berserker
Card Text:
This Berserker must attack if able.

Untap it after it attacks an enemy minion.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Mortal of uncontrollable rage.

Name: Critical Strike
Card Text: An ally deals double combat damage to the next unit it attacks this turn.
Type sentence: Smite your enemy with this Ordinary Magic!

Name: Heat Ray
Card Text: Deals 2 damage to all other units in a cardinal direction from the caster.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic to keep enemies in line.

Name: Boil
Card Text: Destroy all Water minions and auras on or under a nearby site.
Type sentence: A blistering bloodbath of Ordinary Magic.

Name: Incinerate
Card Text:
An allied Dragon may cast Incinerate.

Deals 5 damage to all units on a nearby site.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic in these draconic realms.
Flavor: Of scale and smoke, of flight and flame, these ancient tracts are forged.

Name: Firebolts
Card Text: Shoot three separate firebolts in a cardinal direction. They each deal 1 damage to the first unit they hit.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic in any respected repertoire.

Name: Minor Explosion
Card Text: Deals 3 damage to all units on a nearby site.
Type sentence: A proximal blast of Ordinary Magic.

Name: Mad Dash
Card Text: Give an ally Haste and +1 Movement this turn.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic of utmost urgency.
Flavor: "I'm late, I'm late! For a very important date! No time to say 'hello, goodbye,' I'm late, I'm late, I'm late!" - Lewis Caroll

Name: Spin Attack
Card Text: An ally strikes all enemies at its site.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic of radial violence.

Name: Swiven Scout
Card Text:
Movement +2

An opponent whose Avatar is near this Scout must play with their hand revealed.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mortal surveys the scene.
Flavor: "If you know the enemy and you know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles." - Sun Tsu

Name: Clamor Harpies
Card Text:
Airborne

Genesis → Carry a weaker minion from any site to these Harpies' site. They may strike that minion.
Type sentence: Exceptional Mythics on a feeding frenzy.

Name: Quarrelsome Kobolds
Card Text: At the end of your turn, these Kobolds deal 3 damage to an adjacent minion (including themselves).
Type sentence: Exceptional Monsters raise a ruckus here.
Flavor: “But he started it!” - the kobold who started it.

Name: Fire Salamander
Card Text:
Fire Spellcaster

Immune to noncombat Fire damage.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Spirit of fiery familiarity.
Flavor: The flames lick at our heels as the fire crawls ever upwards.

Name: Hillock Basilisk
Card Text: Enemy minions directly in front of this Basilisk are petrified.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mythic with a stony stare.

Name: Bane Spider
Card Text: Genesis → Kill another minion here.
Type sentence: An Exceptionally deadly Beast skitters forth.
Flavor:
“Will you walk into my parlour?”
said the spider to the fly.
- "The Spider and the Fly" by Mary Howitt

Name: Rollicky Dragonettes
Card Text:
Airborne

At the end of your turn, these Dragonettes fire three separate firebolts in a cardinal direction. They each deal 1 damage to the first unit they hit.
Type sentence: Exceptional Dragons destined to rule.

Name: Bull Demons of Adum
Card Text:
Haste

Tap → These Bulls charge in a cardinal direction until they can't move further. They strike all other units in their path.
Type sentence: Exceptional Demon Beasts of charging rage.

Name: Escyllion Cyclops
Card Text: This Cyclops doesn't deal damage when defending.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mythic with only one focus

Name: Will-o'-the-wisp
Card Text:
Voidwalk

At the end of your turn, this Wisp deals 1 damage to a nearby enemy.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Spirit flares up and disappears.

Name: Wayfaring Pilgrim
Card Text: When this Pilgrim enters each corner of the realm for the first time, draw a spell.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mortal on a spiritual journey.

Name: Outback Strider
Card Text: This Strider moves freely through sites without any enemies.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mortal keeps to himself.

Name: Scavenging Fiend
Card Text:
Burrowing

Genesis → This Fiend picks up a relic from any cemetery.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Undead hunting for treasure.
Flavor: Avarice is a great motivator. It is also a deadly sin.

Name: Fireball
Card Text: Shoot a fireball in a cardinal direction. It deals 4 damage to the first unit it hits and 2 damage to all other units on the same site.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic and straightforward destruction.

Name: Poison Nova
Card Text: Lethal
Type sentence: A deadly breath of Exceptional Magic.

Name: Cone of Flame
Card Text: Caster takes no damage.
Type sentence: A belching blast of Exceptional Magic.

Name: Backstab
Card Text: Sneak an ally to a site with a single enemy minion. That ally strikes it.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of sharp surprise.

Name: Flame Wave
Card Text: Flows from one side of the realm to the other.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic engulfs it all.

Name: Blaze
Card Text: Give an ally +2 Movement this turn. Whenever it leaves a site this turn, Blaze deals 2 damage to all units there.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of scorching speed.

Name: Flashfire
Card Text:
Must be conjured on a nearby site.

At end of turn, this Flashfire burns its site, dealing 4 damage to all ground units there, and then it shifts to an adjacent, previously unburned site. Dispel this Flashfire if it can't move and restore burned sites.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Aura of contagious flame.

Name: Drought
Card Text:
Affected sites cease to be Water sites.

Lasts 3 of your turns.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Aura of desperate dearth.

Name: Wall of Fire
Card Text:
This Wall must be conjured on the border of one of your sites. When you do, you may search your hand and/or spellbook for up to two copies of this, connect them, and shuffle your spellbook.

Minions passing through this Wall are dealt 3 damage.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Aura of fiery denial.

Name: Sandstorm
Card Text:
Players can't untap minions here.

Lasts 3 of your turns.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Aura of blistering confusion.

Name: Infernal Legion
Card Text: At the end of your turn, this Legion deals 3 damage to all other nearby units.
Type sentence: An Elite Undead army in flames.

Name: Maze Minotaur
Card Text: Nearby enemy minions must stay nearby when moving.
Type sentence: An Elite Mythic snarls around the corner.

Name: Doomsday Prophet
Card Text:
Spellcaster

Doubles all magic damage nearby.
Type sentence: An Elite Mortal prognosticating the end.
Flavor: The end is nigh!

Name: Askelon Phoenix
Card Text:
Airborne

Damage from Fire spells and abilities heals Askelon Phoenix, instead.
Type sentence: An Elite Mythic rises up from the ash.

Name: Panorama Manticore
Card Text:
Airborne, Lethal

At the start of each opponent's turn, untap this Manticore.
Type sentence: An Elite Mythic Beast keeps vigilant watch.

Name: Ancient Dragon
Card Text:
Airborne

Tap → This Dragon deals 5 damage to all other units on a nearby site.
Type sentence: An Elite Dragon rules with fear and flame.
Flavor: Fire forges the rule. Terror enforces it.

Name: Far East Assassin
Card Text:
Stealth

Return this Assassin and its borne relics to their owner's hand when it strikes an enemy.
Type sentence: An Elite Mortal swipes from the shadows.

Name: Grosse Poltergeist
Card Text:
Stealth

Nearby relics become minions with power equal to their mana cost. They must attack if able.
Type sentence: An Elite and wretched Spirit of chaos.

Name: Karkemish Chimera
Card Text:
Lethal while fighting an enemy from the rear.
+2 power while fighting an enemy from the front.
+1 Armor while fighting an enemy sideways.

All of the above applies while fighting an enemy on the same site.
Type sentence: An Elite and Beast; deadly, defiant and fierce.

Name: Death Dealer
Card Text: Genesis → Kill all other minions in the realm.
Type sentence: A Unique Mortal and an icon of fantasy.

Name: Courtesan Thais
Card Text: Genesis → You control an opponent during their next turn. They control you during your next turn.
Type sentence: A Unique Mortal you can't disobey.

Name: Cerberus in Chains
Card Text: This Cerberus is chained to the site where it was summoned and is thus immovable while there. Its chain can be destroyed as if it were a relic, thus unleashing this Cerberus.
Type sentence: A Unique Demon on a short leash.

Name: Meteor Shower
Card Text: Target three nonadjacent sites.
Type sentence: Elite Magic of otherworldly destruction.

Name: Disintegrate
Card Text: Banish a unit near the caster and/or everything it's carrying.
Type sentence: Elite Magic of unmitigated annihilation.
Flavor: “ashes to ashes, dust to dust”

Name: Warp Spasm
Card Text: This turn, an ally gains +3 power, +3 Movement and whenever it kills a minion, untap it.
Type sentence: Elite Magic of hyper violence.

Name: Pact with the Devil
Card Text: Sacrifice the caster or lose half your life, rounding up. If you do, draw three cards.
Type sentence: Elite Magic with an eternal price.

Name: Scorched Earth
Card Text: Destroy any number of sites you control and all ground minions and relics there.
Type sentence: Elite Magic of razed ambitions.

Name: Major Explosion
Card Text: Target a nearby site.
Type sentence: A tremendous blast of Elite Magic.

Name: Infiltrate
Card Text: Sneak an allied minion to a site near an enemy Avatar. That minion gains Stealth until your next turn.
Type sentence: Sophisticated Magic to join the Elite.

Name: Immolation
Card Text: Deals 7 damage to a nearby unit.
Type sentence: Unique Magic of distilled devastation.

Name: Jihad
Card Text:
You may summon minions here.

Allies here have +2 power while attacking.
Type sentence: A Unique Aura of zealous determination.

Name: Snow Leopard
Type sentence: An Ordinary Beast prowls the ice-clad peaks.
Flavor:
THIS is the Le-o-pard, my child;
His tem-per's any-thing but mild.
The Leo-pard can't change his spots,
So say the gale of the moun-tain top
 - Is why he is so wild.

Name: Dead of Night Demon
Card Text: Stealth
Type sentence: An Ordinary Demon stalks the witching hours.
Flavor:
Retched for the weald's black maw,
To quake the heart with fear and awe.

Name: Sling Pixies
Card Text:
Airborne, Range +1

These Pixies take no damage from units with power 4 or greater.
Type sentence: Ordinary Mythics flutter forth.

Name: Spectral Stalker
Card Text: Voidwalk
Type sentence: An Ordinary Spirit stalks this neighborhood.
Flavor: “We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far.” ― H. P. Lovecraft

Name: Cloud Spirit
Card Text: Airborne, Movement +2
Type sentence: An Ordinary Spirit hovers o’er the heavens.
Flavor:
Children picture creatures in the clouds.
Innocence sees what wisdom cannot.

Name: Hang Glider
Card Text: At the start of your turn, if this Glider is on a Wind site, it gains Airborne and +2 Movement this turn.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Mortal carried high by ingenuity.

Name: Blood Ravens
Card Text:
Airborne

For every point of damage these Ravens deal to an enemy, you gain one life.
Type sentence: A cruel conspiracy of Ordinary Beasts.
Flavor: "Quoth the raven, Nevermore." - Edgar Allan Poe

Name: Plume Pegasus
Card Text: Airborne
Type sentence: An Ordinary Beast soars high with pride.
Flavor: To see the pegasus fly is to feel the spirit soar.

Name: Men of Leng
Card Text: Whenever these Men deal damage directly to an Avatar, that Avatar's controller discards a random card.
Type sentence: Ordinary Mortal Beasts bleating in discord.

Name: Roaming Monster
Card Text: May be summoned to any site.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Monster appears out of nowhere.

Name: Highland Clansmen
Card Text: Haste
Type sentence: Ordinary barbaric Mortals are at the gates.
Flavor: "The time for talk is over.  These barbarians only listen to the sharpened blade!" - Grand Orator Gormarius

Name: Apprentice Wizard
Card Text:
Spellcaster

Genesis → Draw a spell.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Mortal untrained in restraint.

Name: Palliburrie Bats
Card Text: Airborne, Burrowing
Type sentence: Ordinary Beasts fly out to greet the moon.
Flavor:
To the bat, it is the world that's blind.
To the song-spun tapestry of its kind.

Name: Kite Archer
Card Text:
Range +2

This Skirmisher may run to an adjacent site when it carries out a ranged attack.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Mortal hits and runs.

Name: Whirling Blades
Card Text: Whirl an ally two steps in a cardinal direction. It strikes all enemies it whirls past.
Type sentence: A vicious vortex of Ordinary Magic.

Name: Fade
Card Text: Give an allied minion Stealth until your next turn. Draw a spell.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic to evade the law.
Flavor: Now you see me. Now you don't.

Name: Lightning Bolt
Card Text: Target a site. Deals 3 damage to a random unit there.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic strikes in the night!

Name: Blink
Card Text: Teleport an ally to a site near them. Draw a spell.
Type sentence: An Ordinary flash of short distance Magic.
Flavor: Blink and you’ll miss it.

Name: Teleport
Card Text: Teleport an ally to a site.
Type sentence: A silvery flow of Ordinary Magic.
Flavor: "In the last act there was no real sense of how much time was passing and it felt like everyone was just teleporting everywhere." - Highland theatre critic.

Name: Grapple Shot
Card Text:
An ally fires a grappling hook at target adjacent minion. If the hook hits, it deals 1 damage and it pulls the ally towards the target.

Draw a spell.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic to assist and assault.

Name: Disenchant
Card Text: Destroy all auras and relics on or under a nearby site.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic of shattered fascination.
Flavor: To see it is to disbelieve it.

Name: Raise Dead
Card Text: Summon a minion that costs 3 or less from any cemetery nearby.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic bursts up from below.

Name: Phantom Steed
Card Text:
Movement +2, Voidwalk

This Steed may carry an allied minion, granting it Voidwalk.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Beast roams the border of reality.

Name: Haast Eagle
Card Text:
Airborne

Genesis → Carry a weaker minion from any site to this Eagle's site. It may strike that minion.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Beast of grand bearing.

Name: Daperyll Vampire
Card Text:
Airborne

For every point of damage this Vampire deals to an enemy, you gain one life.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Monster who lusts for blood.

Name: Wind Sylph
Card Text:
Airborne, Wind Spellcaster

Damage from Wind magic this Sylph casts is increased by 1.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Spirit of wisdom and potency.

Name: Scroll Curator
Card Text:
Spellcaster

Genesis → Look at the top 3 cards of your spellbook, put one of them on top and the rest on the bottom in any order.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mortal hits the high spots.

Name: Peregrine Apparition
Card Text:
Airborne, Haste, Voidwalk

This Apparition moves freely in the realm.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Spirit of transcendent velocity.
Flavor: The truly sublime know no bounds.

Name: Headless Haunt
Card Text:
Voidwalk

At the start of your turn, teleport this Haunt to a random location.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Spirit defies time and space.

Name: Highland Falconer
Card Text: Genesis → You may summon an Airborne minion that costs 3 or less from your hand here.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mortal calls for his bird.

Name: Spire Lich
Card Text: Range +1, Spellcaster, Towerbound
Type sentence: An Exceptional Undead watches over the realm.

Name: Vril Revenant
Card Text:
Voidwalk

1 mana → +1 power this turn.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Spirit of transcendent presence.

Name: Gyre Hippogriffs
Card Text: Airborne, Haste
Type sentence: Exceptional Mythic Beasts circle the skies.
Flavor:
Creatures aloft, 
Will oft, 
See the turning of the screw, 
Before me or you.

Name: Phantasmal Shade
Card Text:
This Shade may be summoned to any site.

This Shade dies after taking combat damage from an enemy.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Spirit of imaginary evil.

Name: Midnight Rogue
Card Text:
Range +1, Stealth

This Rogue doesn't exit Stealth when it carries out a ranged attack.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mortal lurks in the dark.
Flavor: Patience is the most deadly of disciplines.

Name: Skirmishers of Mu
Card Text:
Range +1

These Skirmishers may carry out a ranged attack at either the start or the end of their movement.
Type sentence: Exceptional Mortals in sharp engagement.

Name: Waypoint Portal
Card Text: Two locations are adjacent for movement this turn.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of dimensional distortion.
Flavor:
“It was just a colour out of space — a frightful messenger from 
unformed realms of infinity beyond all Nature as we know it.”
—  H.P. Lovecraft

Name: Psionic Blast
Card Text: Deals damage to all nearby enemy minions and knock them back one step.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of repellent thought.

Name: Flanking Maneuver
Card Text: Maneuver any allies on the same site like a chess knight. Draw a spell.
Type sentence: An Exceptional tactic that works like Magic.
Flavor: With sharp wits and swift horses we shall get the better of these arrogant swines!

Name: Rain of Arrows
Card Text: Deal 1 damage to all minions on sites. Minions damaged by these arrows are immobile until your next turn.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic delivering death from above.

Name: Chain Lightning
Card Text: Deals 3 damage to a nearby unit. You may spend 2 additional mana to chain this Lightning to another unit near the previous one, and you may do so any number of times as long as you choose a new target.
Type sentence: An Exceptional sequence of Magical arcs.

Name: Telekinesis
Card Text: Levitate a nearby relic or 1-power minion one step. Draw a spell.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic to redefine property rights.
Flavor:
“If it’s in my hand, it’s mine.”
 - Toddler's first rule.

Name: Windblast
Card Text: Blow all other units and abandoned relics in a cardinal direction until they can't move further.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of compelling force.

Name: Instant Recall
Card Text: Teleport any number of allied minions in harm's way to sites near the caster.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of Quick and last resort.

Name: Thunderstorm
Card Text:
At the end of your turn, shift this Thunderstorm one step. It deals 3 damage to a random unit on affected sites. 

Lasts 3 of your turns.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Aura strikes with impunity.

Name: Evil Presence
Card Text: You may summon a Spirit here. When you do, that minion gains Haste, and return Evil Presence to its owner's hand.
Type sentence: This Exceptional Aura sends a chill up your spine.

Name: Wall of Air
Card Text:
This Wall must be conjured on the border of one of your sites. When you do, you may search your hand and/or spellbook for up to two copies of this, connect them, and shuffle your spellbook.

Airborne minions and projectiles can't move through this Wall.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Aura of bitter obstruction.

Name: Nightmare
Card Text:
Voidwalk, Can't be blocked.

Whenever this Nightmare enters a site, it scares other minions there one step away.
Type sentence: An Elite Spirit that torments and terrifies.

Name: Recurring Specter
Card Text:
Voidwalk, Can't block.

At the end of your turn, you may summon this Specter from your cemetery.
Type sentence: An Elite Spirit that keeps coming back.

Name: Puppet Master
Card Text:
Airborne

Genesis → Gain control of all minions here until Puppet Master leaves the realm.
Type sentence: An Elite Spirit pulls the strings here.

Name: East-West Dragon
Card Text:
Airborne
 
Moves freely while moving sideways.
Type sentence: An Elite serpentine Dragon emerges.

Name: Hounds of Ondaros
Card Text:
Airborne, Burrowing, Submerge, Voidwalk

Nearby enemy Stealth is negated.
Type sentence: No place is safe from these Elite Demons.
Flavor: You can run, but you cannot hide.

Name: Riddle Sphinx
Card Text:
Airborne

Genesis → Draw two cards and reveal one. An opponent chooses which one you discard.
Type sentence: An Elite Mythic puts you to the test.

Name: Grandmaster Wizard
Card Text:
Spellcaster

Genesis → Draw 3 spells.
Type sentence: An Elite Mortal of true arcane expertise.

Name: Nimbus Jinn
Card Text:
Airborne

Whenever this Jinn enters a site, you may discard a spell to have it deal 3 damage to a nearby unit.
Type sentence: An Elite Spirit of turbulent terror.
Flavor: But a ragged leaf, tossed and torn, upon the callous wind.

Name: Phase Assassin
Card Text:
Voidwalk

This Assassin gains Stealth whenever it enters the void.
Type sentence: An Elite Mortal emerges from the other side.

Name: Lord of the Skies
Card Text:
Airborne

Other nearby minions lose Airborne.
Type sentence: A Unique Spirit materializes.

Name: Lord of the Void
Card Text:
Voidbound, Voidwalk

At the end of your turn, this Lord banishes another minion, relic, aura or empty site nearby. If it can't, it banishes your Avatar and you lose the game.
Type sentence: A Unique Spirit of unimaginable emptiness.

Name: Grim Reaper
Card Text:
Indestructible, Voidwalk

This Reaper must be summoned to a random location. When it shares a location with another minion, destroy that minion and shuffle Grim Reaper in its owner's spellbook.
Type sentence: A Unique Spirit we all will meet eventually.

Name: Ultimate Horror
Card Text:
Airborne, Voidwalk 

Genesis → Summon all Demons, Monsters and Spirits from all cemeteries to nearby sites.
Type sentence: A Unique Monster of overwhelming terror.

Name: Ball Lightning
Card Text: Launch a ball of lightning in a cardinal direction. It deals 5 damage to the first unit it hits and any excess damage carries on to whatever it hits next on the same or following sites.
Type sentence: Elite Magic of piercing surprise.

Name: Summoning Sphere
Card Text: You may summon minions here. They cost 1 less mana.
Type sentence: An Elite Aura and aperture of evil.

Name: Forcefield
Card Text:
Enemies and projectiles are stopped at the border of affected sites.

Lasts 5 of your turns as long as the caster stays in, but it lasts one less turn whenever an enemy or projectile tries to enter it.
Type sentence: An Elite Aura of impenetrable protection.

Name: Unlikely Alliance
Card Text: Reveal cards from the top of your spellbook until you reveal an Exceptional card, an Elite card, and a Unique card. Reveal them and put them in your hand. Shuffle.
Type sentence: Unique Magic to forge a strange coalition.

Name: Unique Counterspell
Card Text: Counter a Unique spell.
Type sentence: Quick Magic to outwit Unique genius!
Flavor: A revolutionary idea is forcibly silenced.

Name: Occult Ritual
Card Text: Gain 7 mana this turn.
Type sentence: Unique Magic of a great awakening.
Flavor:
“Ygnaiih ygnaiih thflthkh’ngha… Yog-Sothoth… Y’bthnk h’ehye→n’grkdl’lh!” 
- HP Lovecraft

Name: Dream-quest
Card Text: Search your spellbook for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top of it.
Type sentence: Unique Magic to explore the unknown.

Name: Swamp Buffalo
Type sentence: An Ordinary Beast of ponderous proportions.
Flavor: The swamp buffalo is an icon of contentment.

Name: Sea Serpent
Card Text: Submerge, Waterbound
Type sentence: An Ordinary Beast slithers the deep.
Flavor: Young serpents have been spotted in rivers as far north as the Boreal Forests!

Name: Tuft Turtles
Card Text: Armor +2
Type sentence: Ordinary Beasts of armored wariness.
Flavor: “It’s the turtle’s shell, ugly and hard, that protects its life long journey on earth.” - African Proverb

Name: Muck Lampreys
Card Text: Burrowing, Submerge
Type sentence: Ordinary Beasts that delve and leech.
Flavor:
The pallid tunnelers calmly prowl the muck, 
Ready to bore through mud and flesh alike.

Name: Deep-sea Mermaids
Card Text:
Submerge

Genesis → Draw a spell from the bottom of your spellbook.
Type sentence: Ordinary Mythics of the mysterious depths.

Name: Coral-reef Kelpie
Card Text: Submerge
Type sentence: An Ordinary Beast of the tidal wilderness.
Flavor: The last free land lies under the sea.

Name: Polar Bears
Card Text: These Bears can move as if the top and bottom edges of the realm were connected.
Type sentence: Ordinary Beasts in these extreme regions.

Name: Pirate Ship
Card Text: Waterbound
Type sentence: An Ordinary ship of Mortal scum.
Flavor:
Build me straight, O worthy Master! 
Staunch and strong, a goodly vessel,
That shall laugh at all disaster, 
And with wave and whirlwind wrestle!

Name: Swan Maidens
Card Text: Airborne, Submerge
Type sentence: Ordinary Mortal Beasts of magnificent grace.
Flavor:
Upon our souls they dance, 
A gentle ballet of hopes and dreams.

Name: Unland Eel
Card Text:
Submerge, Waterbound

When this Eel surfaces to attack, it gains +3 power this turn.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Beast of the deadly depths.

Name: Fey Changeling
Card Text:
May be summoned to any site.

Genesis → Return another minion here to its owner's hand.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Mythic and an unwelcome guest.

Name: Fenvale Muse
Card Text: Spellcaster
Type sentence: An Ordinary Mortal and conduit of conjuring.
Flavor:
“Where the waters do agree, it is quite wonderful the relief they give.”
 - Jane Austen

Name: Felbog Frog Men
Card Text: These Frog Men can jump over an adjacent site as they move.
Type sentence: Exceptional hybrids, both Mortal and Beast.

Name: Sedge Crabs
Card Text:
Armor +1

These Crabs can only move sideways.
Type sentence: Ordinary Beasts that scrape and sidle.

Name: Drown
Card Text: Submerge a minion that's on a Water site. (Minions without Submerge die.)
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic of drifting descent.
Flavor: In the darkening deep they dreamed.

Name: Extinguish
Card Text: Destroy all Fire minions and auras on or under a nearby site.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic of flickering failure.

Name: Sleep
Card Text: All minions on a site fall asleep.
Type sentence: Ordinary soporific Magic.
Flavor: Be still until the pain awakes you.

Name: Dodge Roll
Card Text: An ally in harm's way dodges to an adjacent site, evading attacks and targeted spells and abilities.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic, Quick and nimble.

Name: Riptide
Card Text: Pull a unit to a Water site adjacent to them. Draw a spell.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic to trap the unwary.

Name: Unravel
Card Text: Destroy all relics and Undead minions on a nearby site.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic of rot and rest.
Flavor: For life to rise, the dead must crumble.

Name: Fire Harpoons!
Card Text:
An ally fires a harpoon at target minion on or submerged under an adjacent site. If the harpoon hits, it deals 1 damage, surfaces the minion, and reels it in.

Draw a spell.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic for that one big catch.

Name: Guile Sirens
Card Text:
Submerge

At the start of your turn, these Sirens may lure an enemy minion, drawing it one step closer to them.
Type sentence: Exceptional Mythics with three times the charm.

Name: Anui Undine
Card Text: This Undine has +1 power for each site within her body of water.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Spirit of seaborn synergy.
Flavor: The sea will outlive us all.

Name: Brobdingnag Bullfrog
Card Text: Genesis → Swallow a nearby enemy minion. It stays trapped and disabled until Brobdingnag Bullfrog leaves the realm.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Beast with a giant appetite.

Name: Giant Shark
Card Text:
Submerge, Waterbound

Whenever any minion enters or moves within Giant Shark's body of water, Giant Shark swims to that minion, stops it, and fights it.
Type sentence: This Exceptional Beast smells blood in the water.

Name: Sea Raider
Card Text: Whenever Sea Raider kills a minion, you may mill the top card of its controller's spellbook or atlas. You may play that card this turn, ignoring threshold.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mortal roams the sea.

Name: Tringh Constrictor
Card Text: Tap → This Constrictor ensnares a minion here. That minion is disabled as long as this Constrictor stays tapped, and you may choose not to untap it.
Type sentence: This Exceptional Beast furls about your foes.

Name: Porcupine Pufferfish
Card Text: Lethal, Submerge
Type sentence: An Exceptionally prickly little Beast.
Flavor:
A remarkable 11 pufferfish entries are found in Bogd-Uul’s 
comprehensive “Greater and lesser poisons and their uses”.

Name: Tide Naiads
Card Text:
Submerge

These Naiads' location is flooded.
Type sentence: Exceptional Mythics come crashing in.

Name: Ormund Harpooners
Card Text: Tap → These Harpooners fire a harpoon at target minion on or submerged under an adjacent site. If the harpoon hits, it deals 1 damage, surfaces the minion, and reels it in.
Type sentence: Exceptional Mortals on a perilous pursuit.

Name: Bridge Troll
Card Text: Whenever an enemy attacks an undefended site, you may cast this Troll to defend that site without paying its mana cost.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Monster vexed by all who dare.
Flavor: This Troll doesn't want to leave its site. (It can still be forcibly moved or teleported.)

Name: Simulacrum
Card Text: This Simulacrum is summoned as a copy of another nearby minion.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mortal doubles her resolve.

Name: Accursed Albatross
Card Text:
Airborne

When a minion kills this Albatross, all of that minion's nearby allies die, except itself.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Beast of deadly portent.

Name: Upwelling
Card Text: Return all minions and relics on or under a site to their owner's hand.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of fluid undoing.

Name: Geyser
Card Text: This turn, flood a site and all minions on it gain Airborne.
Type sentence: A sudden gush of Exceptional Magic.

Name: Pollimorph
Card Text: Transform a nearby Mortal into a Frog token, or transform a nearby Frog into a Prince from your collection.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of amphibious mutation.

Name: Shrink
Card Text: Until your next turn, set a nearby minion's innate power to 0 and reduce its size so it occupies only one location.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic for miniature afficionados.

Name: Ice Lance
Card Text: Deals damage to up to three target units in a line:
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of cold precision.

Name: Frost Nova
Card Text: Deals damage to all nearby enemy minions and freeze them until your next turn.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of explosive cold.

Name: Marine Voyage
Card Text: Rearrange any allied minions on or under one body of Water.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of course correction.

Name: Stormy Seas
Card Text: Submerge all minions on a Water site.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic with devastating consequences.
Flavor: Ambitions are sundered in the storms of fate.

Name: Flow of Life
Card Text: You gain life equal to the number of Water sites in the realm.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of eternal youth.

Name: Mariner's Curse
Card Text: 4 mana, Sacrifice → Submerge all minions on affected Water sites.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Aura of unforgiving seas.

Name: Flood
Card Text: Affected sites are flooded. Lasts 3 of your turns.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Aura of severe overflow.

Name: Wall of Ice
Card Text:
This Wall must be conjured on the border of one of your sites. When you do, you may search your hand and/or spellbook for up to two copies of this, connect them, and shuffle your spellbook.

Ground minions can't move through this Wall.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Aura of frigid resistance.

Name: Blizzard
Card Text:
Players can't untap minions here.

Lasts 3 of your turns.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Aura of forestalling frost

Name: Mega Amoeba
Card Text: This Amoeba continues to occupy each site it's visited, and has +1 power for each.
Type sentence: An Elite Monster engulfs the realm.

Name: Diluvian Kraken
Card Text:
Submerge

Whenever this Kraken surfaces, it strikes all nearby enemies.
Type sentence: An Elite Monster of far-reaching terror.

Name: Sneak Thief
Card Text:
Stealth

This Thief may be summoned to any site with an abandoned relic.
Type sentence: An Elite and felonious Mortal.

Name: Seirawan Hydra
Card Text: Immune to non-Lethal damage.
Type sentence: An Elite Mythic of multifarious might.

Name: Court Jester
Card Text: At the end of your turn, the owner of any nearby Avatar must discard a random card.
Type sentence: An Elite Mortal with a dangerous smile.

Name: Ghost Ship
Card Text:
Voidwalk

When this Ship is destroyed, summon an Undead and a Spirit from your cemetery here.
Type sentence: Elite Spirits sail the Undead seas.

Name: Polar Explorers
Card Text: Allies here can move as if the top and bottom edges of the realm were connected.
Type sentence: Elite Mortals on an extreme expedition.

Name: Adept Illusionist
Card Text:
Spellcaster

Tap → Summon an Adept Illusionist nearby from your spellbook, hand, or cemetery.
Type sentence: An Elite Mortal appears here, or does he?

Name: Captain Baldassare
Card Text: Whenever Captain Baldassare stops on an opponent's site, you may mill up to three total cards from the tops of that opponent's spellbook and atlas. You may play those cards this turn, ignoring threshold.
Type sentence: A Unique Mortal of seafaring infamy.

Name: Mother Nature
Card Text: Once on your turn, when you summon a minion nearby, reveal cards from the top of your spellbook until you find a minion and summon it here. Shuffle.
Type sentence: A Unique Mythic of divine fecundity.

Name: Lord of Unland
Card Text:
Submerge 

Whether this Lord is on or under a Water site, other allied Water minions in this body of water have +1 power.
Type sentence: A Unique Spirit of aquatic influence.

Name: Great Old One
Card Text: Indestructible, Submerge
Type sentence: A Unique Monster stirs beneath the surface.

Name: Ruler of Thul
Card Text: This Ruler can move as if the top and bottom edges of the realm were connected, and he moves freely within the top and bottom rows.
Type sentence: A Unique Mortal and his glacial Beasts.

Name: Wrath of the Sea
Card Text: Flood sites near Water this turn. Submerge all minions and relics on Water sites. (Minions without Submerge die.)
Type sentence: A merciless deluge of Elite Magic.

Name: Body Swap
Card Text: Swap the locations of two Avatars or two minions.
Type sentence: Elite Magic that trades faces and places.
Flavor: Nudge the wheel of fortune in your favour.

Name: Mesmerism
Card Text: You control all minions on affected sites as long as the caster stays on them. Lasts 3 of your turns.
Type sentence: An Elite Aura of ultimate control.

Name: Replication
Card Text: This Replication is conjured as a copy of a relic near the caster.
Type sentence: An Elite Aura of perfect duplication.
Flavor:
"All art is but imitation of nature."
- Seneca

Name: Abundance
Card Text:
Must be conjured at the intersection of two sites.

Affected sites give twice as much mana and elemental threshold.
Type sentence: An Elite Aura of exuberant fruitfulness.

Name: Plague of Frogs
Card Text: Summon seven Frog tokens to any combination of sites.
Type sentence: Unique Magic in its most annoying form.
Flavor: "The frogs will come up on you and your people and all your officials." - Exodus 8:4

Name: Atlantean Fate
Card Text: Affected non-Ordinary sites become Water sites, only provide Water threshold and lose all other abilities. All minions and relics on those sites are submerged and can’t surface.
Type sentence: A Unique Aura of entombing tides.

Name: Grey Wolves
Card Text:
These wolves have +1 power for each other Grey Wolves nearby.

There's no limit on the number of Grey Wolves you can have in your deck.
Type sentence: Ordinary Beasts of the wooded wilds.
Flavor: The wolves o’ the wood, In wait they lay. And with tooth and claw, They’ll have their way.

Name: Belmotte Longbowmen
Card Text: Range +1
Type sentence: These Ordinary Mortals aim at foes far away.
Flavor: "Clumsy and slow, the wretched crossbow, A cousin thus crafted to odious foe." - Archer’s Lament

Name: Root Spider
Card Text:
Burrowing

While this Spider is burrowed, minions on its site are immobile.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Beast with a trap of lace.

Name: Autumn Unicorn
Type sentence: These Ordinary Mythics won’t fade yet into legend.
Flavor: "The lion and the unicorn were fighting for the crown. The lion beat the unicorn all around town. Some gave them white bread, some gave them brown. Some gave them plum cake and drummed them out of town." - English Nursery Rhyme

Name: Bosk Troll
Type sentence: An Ordinary Monster wanders these woods.
Flavor: A troll’s thoughts are but reflections in a forest pool, wavering and rippling with the wind and the rain.

Name: Cave Trolls
Card Text: Burrowing
Type sentence: Ordinary Monsters, nosing down into the ground.
Flavor: "We dug, we lug, we scoff up the bug, We bore, we gore, we snore for the ore." - Trollish Working Song

Name: Wild Boars
Type sentence: Ordinary Beasts of bold black bristle.
Flavor:
I was once again drowsing, when I glanced at a bush,
And several wild boar came charging, all in a rush!

Name: Scent Hounds
Card Text: Nearby enemy Stealth is negated.
Type sentence: Ordinary Beasts with extraordinary sniffers.
Flavor: For the upwardly mobile of the Midland Court, accolades in the Royal Hunt of the Mist were as treasured as any war-time achievement.

Name: Mage Hunter
Card Text: Immune to magic
Type sentence: Mystics beware this Ordinary Mortal!
Flavor: Magic is a story spun by those who covet power.

Name: Scourge Zombies
Card Text: When these Zombies die on a non-Water site, burrow them instead. Unburrow if a Mortal dies nearby.
Type sentence: Ordinary Undead grasp life once again.

Name: Amazon Warriors
Type sentence: Ordinary Mythics prepare for war.
Flavor: "We shall arm ourselves in our war gear and waken sharp Ares by the hollow vessels." - Homer

Name: Midland Mercenaries
Card Text: You may discard a card rather than pay these Mercenaries' mana cost.
Type sentence: Ordinary Mortals who’ll fight at a price.
Flavor: “Inspired by the purse rather than the soul, heaven offers nothing to these scoundrels.” - Eminar Rann

Name: Land Surveyor
Card Text: Genesis → Draw a site.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Mortal privileges the crown.

Name: Bone Rabble
Card Text: When this Rabble dies on a non-Water site, burrow it instead. It can unburrow as if it had Burrowing.
Type sentence: Ordinary Undead scrabble to the surface.

Name: Common Sense
Card Text: Search your spellbook for an Ordinary spell, reveal it, and put it in your hand. Shuffle.
Type sentence: The Ordinary appears as Magic to some.
Flavor:
“Common sense is the genius of humanity.” 
- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Name: Ordinary Counterspell
Card Text: Counter an Ordinary spell.
Type sentence: Quick Magic to ignore the Ordinary.
Flavor: A mundane moment, easily dismissed.

Name: Border Militia
Card Text: Summon a Foot Soldier token to each of your Villages that's near one or more enemy sites.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic to defend our motherland.

Name: Dispel
Card Text: Destroy all auras and relics on or under a nearby site.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic of shattered vanity.
Flavor: Pride cometh before the fall.

Name: Bury
Card Text: Burrow a minion or relic that's on a non-Water site. (If it does not have the Burrowing keyword, it still survives but can't unburrow.)
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic one hopes to never experience.
Flavor: "From out of the depths of the countless pits there came a melancholy rustling from the garments of the buried." - Edgar Allan Poe

Name: Overpower
Card Text: Give an ally +3 power this turn.
Type sentence: Ordinary Magic to crush your foe!

Name: Entangle Terrain
Card Text:
Ground minions here are immobile.

Lasts 3 of your turns.
Type sentence: A trammeling Aura of Ordinary roots.

Name: Frontier Settlers
Card Text: Frontier Settlers may move into an adjacent void. When they do, place the top site of your atlas there. Once settled, they become immobile.
Type sentence: Exceptional Mortals of sweat and survival.
Flavor: "Be fruitful, and multiply, and replenish the earth." - Genesis 1:28

Name: Dwarven Digging Team
Card Text:
Burrowing

When this Team burrows, a nearby allied minion may burrow. When this Team unburrows, a nearby allied minion may unburrow.
Type sentence: Exceptional Mythics frantically dig deeper.

Name: Pudge Butcher
Card Text:
Immobile

Tap  Pudge Butcher launches a hook in a cardinal direction, drags the first unit hit to his location, and deals 5 damage to it if it's an enemy.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Monster of sloth and greed.

Name: Monastery Gargoyle
Card Text:
Airborne

At the start of each turn, choose whether Monastery Gargoyle is a minion or just a relic.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Monster weathers the conditions.
Flavor: Through rain and regret, Through wind and war, We bide our precious time.

Name: Vanguard Knights
Card Text: These Knights have +2 power as long as they are alone as the furthest forward of your units.
Type sentence: Ride, Exceptional Mortals, to the battlefront!

Name: House Arn Bannerman
Card Text: Other nearby allies have +1 power.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mortal holds your banner high.
Flavor: Our family banner will once again be a symbol of strength!

Name: Yourke Crossbowmen
Card Text:
Range +1

These Crossbowmen take no damage from ranged attacks.
Type sentence: Exceptional Mortals entrenched and armed.
Flavor: A crude-hewn stick with twanging string. The longbow does break for the rising king!

Name: Shield Maidens
Card Text:
Armor +1

Other nearby allied minions have Armor +1.
Type sentence: Exceptional Mortals hold the line.
Flavor: My word is my bond, my shield is my service.

Name: Monster Hunter
Card Text: Genesis → Kills a nearby Monster.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mortal on a grim mission
Flavor: Not glory nor profit, is the reward. A safer world is.

Name: Gneissgnath Gnomes
Card Text:
Burrowing

These Gnomes can unburrow onto any site in their span of non-Water sites. At the end of your turn, they may burrow.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Spirit crops up unexpectedly.

Name: Slumbering Giantess
Card Text: Genesis → Falls asleep.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mythic dozes peacefully.

Name: Imperial Pikemen
Card Text: These Pikemen deal combat damage before other minions they fight.
Type sentence: Exceptional Mortals stand fabulous in force.

Name: Master Tracker
Card Text: Master Tracker can attack burrowed, submerged, and stealthed minions.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Mortal finds his way to your side.

Name: Trill Wolpertinger
Card Text: This Wolpertinger has Airborne if there are no other minions with Airborne. The same is true for Burrowing, Lethal, and Submerge.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Beast of tooth, claw and horn.

Name: Exceptional Counterspell
Card Text: Counter an Exceptional spell.
Type sentence: Quick Magic to prevent the Exceptional.
Flavor: The bright idea is dulled by expectation.

Name: Cave-in
Card Text: Burrow all ground minions on a non-Water site or unburrow all minions there.
Type sentence: Exceptional Magic of either despair or relief.

Name: Enlist
Card Text: Search your spellbook for an Ordinary or Exceptional Mortal, reveal it, and put it in your hand. Shuffle.
Type sentence: The Exceptional Magic that is duty.

Name: Minecart Madness
Card Text: Rearrange any burrowed allied minions within one span of non-Water sites.
Type sentence: A wild, rickety ride of Exceptional Magic.

Name: Wraetannis Titan
Card Text: Genesis → Deals 6 damage to all enemies on an adjacent site.
Type sentence: An Elite Mythic makes an epic entrance.

Name: Conqueror Worm
Card Text:
Excess attack damage carries over to opponents' sites.

Whenever this Worm damages a site, you gain control of it for as long as it stays atop it.
Type sentence: An Elite Monster subjugates this realm.

Name: Sisters of Silence
Card Text: Only one spell may be cast each turn.
Type sentence: These Elite Mortals are not to be disturbed.
Flavor:
“Since long I’ve held silence as a remedy for harm.”
- Aeschylus

Name: Tragedy Worrywart
Card Text: Prevents all magic damage nearby.
Type sentence: An Elite Mortal prepares for the worst.
Flavor: Better safe than sorry.

Name: Royal Bodyguard
Card Text: You may have any damage that would be dealt to a nearby Avatar or Royal be dealt to Royal Bodyguard instead.
Type sentence: An Elite Mortal hand-picked for his loyalty.

Name: Stone-gaze Gorgons
Card Text: Other minions stopped on an adjacent site are petrified, unless they're carrying a relic.
Type sentence: Elite Mythics gaze longingly from this vantage.
Flavor: Look at me!

Name: Sirian Templar
Card Text: This Templar takes no damage from Demons, Spirits, and Undead.
Type sentence: An Elite Mortal, here to purge the damned.
Flavor:
My shield is anchored by a holy purpose.
My sword is guided by the light of God!

Name: Seasoned Sellsword
Card Text:
You may discard a card rather than pay this Sellswords mana cost.

At the start of each opponent's turn, untap Seasoned Sellsword.
Type sentence: An Elite Mortal under contract to protect.

Name: Silver Valkyries
Card Text:
Airborne, Armor +2

Allies here can't be targeted by enemy spells and abilities.
Type sentence: Elite Mythics hold their immortal vigil.

Name: Mordric Druids
Card Text:
Spellcaster

Whenever an opponent damages one of your nearby sites, each enemy Avatar loses that much life.
Type sentence: Elite Mortals of primordial vengeance.

Name: Squirming Mass
Card Text: Whenever an adjacent minion dies, Squirming Mass permanently gains that minion's innate power.
Type sentence: Elite Beasts wriggle around your feet.

Name: Atlas Wanderers
Card Text: These Wanderers can move to a void, carrying their site with them as they move.
Type sentence: These Elite Mythics take the weight of the world

Name: Mountain Giant
Card Text: Occupies four sites.
Type sentence: An Elite Mythic of geologic scope.
Flavor: Hearth and heart will tremble.

Name: Alvalinne Dryads
Card Text: Genesis → Untap a nearby ally.
Type sentence: Elite Mythics make arborous harvest.
Flavor:
How strange to greet, this misty morn,
A graceful parade of elusive blossom.
These children of the wildwood, born
A verdant force, a power so awesome.

Name: Crown Prince
Card Text: When this Prince dies, return him to it's owner's hand.
Type sentence: This Unique Mortal graces you with his presence.
Flavor: Willam, Richarr, Hari, Ste. Hari 2, Dirk, Jon. Neds 1, 2, 3, Richarr 2, Hari 3,4,5 the who? Neds 4, 5, Richarr 3, The end of the Daniger Dynasty!

Name: Queen of Midland
Card Text: Whenever an opponent draws a card while this Queen is on a middle site, you may draw a card.
Type sentence: A Unique Mortal at the center of attention.

Name: King of the Realm
Card Text:
Other allied Mortals have +2 power. 

Genesis → Gain control of all Mortals in the realm.
Type sentence: A Unique Mortal with a true claim to the throne.

Name: Midland Army
Card Text:
When this Army dies, summon eight Foot Soldier tokens on nearby sites.

Tap → Deals 8 damage to all units on another site.
Type sentence: A Unique army of Mortals, yours to command.

Name: Elite Counterspell
Card Text: Counter an Elite spell.
Type sentence: Quick Magic to snub the Elite!
Flavor: Grand notions reduced to dust.

Name: Earthquake
Card Text: Choose a square block of four locations. Burrow all ground minions on affected non-Water sites. You may rearrange the placement of those sites within the block.
Type sentence: Terrible, violent and severe Elite Magic.

Name: Assorted Animals
Card Text: Search your spellbook for any number of Beast cards with a combined mana cost of X or less. Shuffle.
Type sentence: Elite Magic to multiply your minions.

Name: Rest in Peace
Card Text: Burrow all Undead and Spirit minions at affected locations. They can't unburrow.
Type sentence: An Elite Aura of grave permanence.

Name: Divine Healing
Card Text: Fully heal an Avatar or minion.
Type sentence: Unique Magic, cleansing body and soul.
Flavor: "I have heard your prayer and seen your tears; I will heal you." - 2 Kings 20:5

Name: Gigantism
Card Text: An ally occupies four sites and gains +7 power this turn.
Type sentence: Unique Magic of great magnitude.
Flavor: Pity these meek and measly men!

Name: Craterize
Card Text:
You must discard a site as an additional cost to cast this.

Destroy a site and everything on or under it.
Type sentence: Unique Magic of cataclysmic proportions.

Name: Crusade
Card Text:
You may summon minions here.

Allies here have +1 power.
Type sentence: A Unique Aura to reclaim the holy land.

Name: Wicker Manikin
Card Text:
Spellcaster

When this Manikin casts a spell, destroy it.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Automaton grows from sprig to servant.
Flavor:
Shave of limb, carve of heart,
the twisting grain of turner's art.

Name: Poisonous Dagger
Card Text: Bearer — Lethal.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Relic of virulent venom.

Name: Scarecrow
Card Text: Airborne enemies can't enter this site.
Type sentence: A gaunt and ragged Ordinary Relic.

Name: Crave Golem
Card Text: This Golem can't attack sites and must attack if able.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Construct of urgent hunger.
Flavor: It ate our enemies, but it was still hungry. It ate our neighbours, but it was still hungry. It ate my creator, but it was still hungry.

Name: Siege Ballista
Card Text: Bearer — Tap, Tap this Ballista → Shoot a bolt in a cardinal direction at target enemy two steps away. This Ballista deals 3 damage to it.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Relic of death from afar.

Name: Screaming Skull
Card Text: Bearer — Haste.
Type sentence: A runed Relic of Exceptional anger.

Name: Rolling Boulder
Card Text: Bearer — Tap → Push this Boulder in a cardinal direction. It rolls until it can't move further, and deals 4 damage to all units in its path.
Type sentence: Look out for this Exceptional Relic!

Name: Battering Ram
Card Text:
Whenever Battering Ram moves onto a site, knock back all enemies there one step.

Deathrite → Summon 2 Foot Soldiers tokens here.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Vehicle for armored advance.

Name: Flaming Sword
Card Text: Bearer — +1 power; full attack damage splashes to all enemies here.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Relic of furious zeal.

Name: Seven-league Boots
Card Text: Bearer — +7 Movement.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Relic of breakneck speed.

Name: Magnetic Muzzle
Card Text:
Bearer  — Disabled

At the end of your turn, if this Muzzle is abandoned, attach it to a nearby minion.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Relic of irresistible silence.

Name: Truesight Crossbow
Card Text: Bearer — Range +1, Can attack Stealth minions.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Relic that always strikes true.

Name: Torshammar Trinket
Card Text:
Bearer — +1 power.

At the end of your turn, return this Trinket to its owner's hand.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Relic of recurring force.

Name: Sunken Treasure
Card Text:
An opponent chooses which of your Water sites you conjure this under.

Bearer — Sacrifice this Treasure → If above ground, draw 2 cards.
Type sentence: Long lost Exceptional Relics waiting to be found.

Name: Buried Treasure
Card Text:
An opponent chooses which of your non-Water sites you conjure this under.

Bearer — Sacrifice this Treasure → If above ground, draw 2 cards.
Type sentence: X marks the spot for this Exceptional Relic.

Name: Lucky Charm
Card Text: Bearer — If this minion would die, banish Lucky Charm and return that minion to its owner's hand, instead.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Relic to keep your streak alive.

Name: All-terrain Vestments
Card Text: Bearer — This minion has Burrowing, Submerge, Voidwalk, and is not bound to any element.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic for any adventure.

Name: Land Deed
Card Text: You control this site.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic to prove an indisputable claim.
Flavor: Possession is nine tenths of the law.

Name: Purge Juggernaut
Card Text: Whenever this Juggernaut moves, destroy all minions in its path.
Type sentence: An Elite Vehicle of ceaseless slaughter.

Name: Payload Trebuchet
Card Text: Bearer — Tap, Tap this Trebuchet, Discard a card → This Trebuchet deals damage equal to the discarded card's cost to all units on another site in a cardinal direction.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic of unmatched range.

Name: Zephyranne Airship
Card Text:
Airborne, Movement +3

This Airship may carry any allies as it moves.
Type sentence: An Elite Vehicle takes to the skies.

Name: Mask of Mayhem
Card Text:
Double nearby combat damage between units.

Bearer — Must attack if able.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic in the midst of a mad melee.

Name: Angel's Egg
Card Text: At the end of each turn, this Egg heals 1 damage from the controller of this site.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic. A hope reborn.

Name: Devil's Egg
Card Text: At the end of each turn, this Egg deals 1 damage to this site.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic. A direful roe of ruination.

Name: Magellan Globe
Card Text: Bearer — Allies can move as if opposite edges of the realm were connected.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic for the intrepid traveler.
Flavor: The world is small. The earth is round. We’ll meet someday.

Name: Mix Aer
Card Text: Air spells the bearer casts cost one less mana and require one less Air threshold.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic of soaring ambition.

Name: Mix Terra
Card Text: Earth spells the bearer casts cost one less mana and require one less Earth threshold.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic of geotic potency.

Name: Mix Aqua
Card Text: Water spells the bearer casts cost one less mana and require one less Water threshold.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic of swirling mystery.

Name: Mix Ignis
Card Text: Fire spells the bearer casts cost one less mana and require one less Fire threshold.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic of mercurial volatility.

Name: Undertaker Engine
Card Text: At the end of your turn, burrow or unburrow any number of relics or minions on an adjacent site.
Type sentence: An Elite Automaton of possessed cryptopsy.

Name: Maddening Bells
Card Text: Spells cast nearby cost 2 more mana.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic of delirious dissonance.
Flavor: I can't hear myself think!

Name: Drums of Doom
Card Text: Nearby damage is Lethal.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic of decisive mass percussion.
Flavor: The most persistent sound which reverberates through man's history is the beating of war drums.

Name: Crown of the Victor
Card Text:
As long as an ally killed an enemy minion this turn, this Crown may be cast for 5 less mana if conjured to that ally.

Bearer — +3 power.
Type sentence: An Elite Relic for the brave and the glorious.

Name: Gilded Aegis
Card Text:
Bearer — Armor +2.

If the bearer would die, instead banish Gilded Aegis, and they can't die this turn.
Type sentence: An Unique Relic shines in defense.

Name: Spear of Destiny
Card Text: Bearer — Tap → Throw this Spear in a cardinal direction. It kills the first enemy minion it hits.
Type sentence: A Unique Relic guided by divine providence.

Name: Doomsday Device
Card Text: After 4 turns, this Device detonates. (It deals no damage if burrowed.)
Type sentence: This Unique Relic surely spells the end!

Name: Erik's Curiosa
Card Text:
Can and must be conjured in a corner void.

When an Avatar picks up this Curiosa, they sacrifice it and draw 3 cards.
Type sentence: Unique Relics from realms long forgotten.

Name: Philosopher's Stone
Card Text: Spells the bearer casts cost one less mana and require one less of each elemental threshold.
Type sentence: This Unique Relic is the magnum opus of alchemy.

Name: Pnakotic Manuscript
Card Text: Bearer — Tap → Discard a card. Draw a card.
Type sentence: A Unique Relic of insidious consumption.
Flavor: Progress. Power. Accumulation. These pages antedate the human race, and I dare to predict, will postdate it. - Vicar Colinus

Name: Book of Kells
Card Text: Bearer — Tap → Reveal the top card of your spellbook and note its mana cost. Heal that much damage from a nearby unit.
Type sentence: A Unique Relic to illuminate the soul.
Flavor: Abstract decoration and ornament punctuate and underline the text and it’s glorious message. Such fineness and delicacy has been likened to, and even surpasses that of the goldsmiths beyond the azure ridge!

Name: The Immortal Throne
Card Text:
Whenever anyone plays a card with cost equal to this Throne's level, you draw a card and this gains a level.
 
When this hits level 7, the first Avatar that sits on this Throne wins the game.
Type sentence: A Unique Relic and Monument to eternal rule.

Name: Rustic Village
Card Text: Genesis → Summon a Foot Soldier token here.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Site of fertile earth.

Name: Humble Village
Card Text: Genesis → Summon a Foot Soldier token here.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Site of fertile earth.

Name: Simple Village
Card Text: Genesis → Summon a Foot Soldier token here.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Site of fertile earth.

Name: Spring River
Card Text: Genesis → Look at your top spellbook card. You may put it on the bottom.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Site of refreshing water.

Name: Summer River
Card Text: Genesis → Look at your top spellbook card. You may put it on the bottom.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Site of refreshing water.

Name: Autumn River
Card Text: Genesis → Look at your top spellbook card. You may put it on the bottom.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Site of refreshing water.

Name: Lone Tower
Card Text: Genesis → Gain 1 mana this turn.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Site of haunting wind.

Name: Dark Tower
Card Text: Genesis → Gain 1 mana this turn.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Site of haunting wind.

Name: Gothic Tower
Card Text: Genesis → Gain 1 mana this turn.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Site of haunting wind.

Name: Red Desert
Card Text: Genesis → Deals 1 damage to all units on a nearby site.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Site of ruinous fire.

Name: Remote Desert
Card Text: Genesis → Deals 1 damage to all units on a nearby site.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Site of ruinous fire.

Name: Arid Desert
Card Text: Genesis → Deals 1 damage to all units on a nearby site.
Type sentence: An Ordinary Site of ruinous fire.

Name: Undertow
Card Text: Genesis → Drag a minion in this body of water to this site.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Site with compelling pull.

Name: Updraft Ridge
Card Text: Genesis → Nearby Airborne minions gain +2 Movement this turn.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Site of singing tailwinds.

Name: Shifting Sands
Card Text: Genesis → Reactivate the Genesis abilities of your nearby Deserts.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Site of feverish fury.

Name: Quagmire
Card Text: Genesis → Nearby ground minions are immobile until your next turn.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Site of temporary impediment.

Name: Mountain Pass
Card Text: Ground minions can't enter this Pass if there is one here already.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Site of narrow access.

Name: Watchtower
Card Text: Nearby enemy Stealth is negated.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Site with ever vigilant watchmen.

Name: Stonehenge
Card Text: Minions here are Spellcasters.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Site where leylines converge.

Name: Free City
Card Text: This City defends itself with a power of 4 until defeated once.
Type sentence: This Exceptional Site accepts no foreign ruler.

Name: Secret Tunnel
Card Text: Your minions that unburrow may do so here.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Site to help in times of trouble.

Name: Gnome Hollows
Card Text: Minions with 4 or more power can't enter these Hollows.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Site of quaint community.

Name: Floodplain
Card Text: Genesis → Flood a nearby site this turn.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Site of rising tides.

Name: Vantage Hills
Card Text: Ranged units here have +1 Range.
Type sentence: A rugged Site with Exceptional views.

Name: Holy Ground
Card Text: Genesis → Heal 2 damage from all nearby allies.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Site of spiritual strength.

Name: Cornerstone
Card Text: This Cornerstone may be played on a corner void.
Type sentence: An Exceptional Site to lay a good foundation.

Name: Bedrock
Card Text: You may play a site atop this Bedrock. Both are immovable and indestructible.
Type sentence: An immovable Site of Exceptional solidity.

Name: Mudflow
Card Text: Genesis → Surface and unburrow all nearby minions.
Type sentence: A Exceptional Site of amorphous primeval mud.

Name: Aqueduct
Card Text: This site is both a Village and a River.
Type sentence: Earth guides the flow of Water through one Elite Site.

Name: Steppe
Card Text: This site is both a Village and a Desert.
Type sentence: Earth and fire baked into one Elite Site.

Name: Oasis
Card Text: This site is both a River and a Desert.
Type sentence: Fire and water boiled into one Elite Site

Name: Lighthouse
Card Text: This site is both a River and a Tower.
Type sentence: Wind and water swirl in one Elite Site.

Name: Ruins
Card Text: This site is both a Tower and a Desert.
Type sentence: Wind and Fire breathe in one Elite Site.

Name: Windmill
Card Text: This site is both a Tower and a Village.
Type sentence: Wind and earth toil together in one Elite Site.

Name: Sinkhole
Card Text: This Sinkhole may be played under any site, destroying both.
Type sentence: An Elite Site on the verge of collapse.

Name: Planar Gate
Card Text: Minions here have Voidwalk until they enter a site.
Type sentence: An Elite Site and portal into the unknown.

Name: Northern Battlefront
Card Text: This Frontline may be played in a void that has a site directly in front of it.
Type sentence: An Elite Site where heroes are born.

Name: Nowhere Land
Card Text: This site is adjacent to all void locations.
Type sentence: An Elite Site amidst the black seas of infinity.

Name: Leviathan Island
Card Text: (W)(W)(W)(W)(W)(W): This Island defends itself with a power of 12 until defeated once.
Type sentence: An Elite Site of Monstrous nature.

Name: Observatory
Card Text: Genesis → Look at your top 3 spellbook cards and put them back on top in any order.
Type sentence: An Elite Site to study the future and the past.

Name: Bottomless Pit
Card Text: At the end of each turn, ground minions here fall to their doom and die.
Type sentence: An Elite Site of ever descending despair.

Name: Mirage
Card Text: You may swap Mirage from your hand with another site you own in the realm.
Type sentence: Salvation fades from this Elite Site.

Name: Imperial Road
Card Text: Genesis → Your opponent, and then you, may play an extra site adjacent to this Road.
Type sentence: An Elite Site from ages of antiquity.

Name: Crossroads
Card Text: Genesis → Look at your top 4 atlas cards. Put one back on top and the others on the bottom in any order.
Type sentence: An Elite Site to point you in the right direction.

Name: Maelstrom
Card Text: (W)(W): Genesis → Pull all nearby units onto this site.
Type sentence: An Elite Site of ineluctable malevolence.

Name: Edge of the World
Card Text: This site must have an adjacent void.
Type sentence: An Elite Site on the border of reality.

Name: Dwarven Forge
Card Text: All players may conjure relics here. The first relic conjured here each turn costs 2 less mana.
Type sentence: An Unique Site of smithy ambition.

Name: Donnybrook Inn
Card Text: All players may summon minions here. The first minion summoned here each turn costs 2 less mana.
Type sentence: A Unique Site for letting off steam.

Name: Pristine Paradise
Card Text: This Paradise does not give any threshold if it has a minion on it.
Type sentence: A Unique Site of virgin splendor

Name: Great Wall
Card Text: Enemy ground minions and projectiles are stopped by Great Wall's front border.
Type sentence: A Unique Site of stalwart safety.

Name: Mirror Realm
Card Text: This site mirrors the threshold and abilities of adjacent sites.
Type sentence: A Unique Site of enriching reflection.

Name: Vesuvius
Card Text: (F)(F)(F): Sacrifice → Deal 3 damage to all units on nearby sites.
Type sentence: A Uniquely volatile Site on the verge of calamity.

Name: Tadpole Pool
Card Text: (W)(W)(W): Genesis → Summon three Frog tokens here.
Type sentence: A Unique Site and nursery for nuisance.

Name: City of Agartha
Card Text: Allies may move while burrowed.
Type sentence: A Unique Site at the center of it all.

Name: The Apex of Babel
Type sentence: A Unique and impossibly lofty Site.

Name: The Base of Babel
Card Text: You may finish this tower by placing its apex atop. When you do, each minion becomes controlled by a random player.
Type sentence: A Unique and impossibly massive Site.

Name: Cloud City
Card Text: (A)(A): Once on your turn, you may shift this City to an adjacent void.
Type sentence: A Unique Site, lofty and ever fleeting.

Name: River of Flame
Card Text: Fire Spellcaster
Type sentence: A Unique Site of pure, overflowing rage.

Name: Smokestacks of Gnaak
Card Text: At the start of your turn, players must sacrifice a minion on an adjacent site.
Type sentence: A Unique Site of industrialized evil.

Name: Land Bank
Card Text: Genesis → If you control fewer sites than each opponent, draw a site.
Type sentence: A Unique Site; peculiar and inexhaustible.

Name: Rift Valley
Card Text: You may pull apart a partial row and column to make a void for this.
Type sentence: An Elite Site of startling displacement.

Name: Sorcerer
Card Text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Start the game with four spells in your hand.
Type sentence: Your Avatar to assert your dominance.

Name: Avatar of Water
Card Text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.
 
Whenever you play a Water site, you may teleport to it and flood a nearby site until you do so again.
Type sentence: Your Avatar of charm and trickery.

Name: Avatar of Fire
Card Text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.
 
Tap → Fire sites in your hand are Firebolts this turn.
Type sentence: Your Avatar of desire and destruction.

Name: Avatar of Earth
Card Text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

You and your Earth sites have +1 Armor.
Type sentence: Your Avatar of enduring strength.

Name: Avatar of Air
Card Text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Once on your turn, you may blow an ally on a Wind site to a nearby site.
Type sentence: Your Avatar of knowledge and power.

Name: Pathfinder
Card Text:
Start the game with only one site in your hand.

Tap → Play a site or move from a site into an adjacent void, placing the top site from your atlas there.
Type sentence: Your Avatar finds the way towards victory.

Name: Seer
Card Text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

At the start of your turn, look at the top card of your spellbook. You may put it on the bottom.
Type sentence: Your Avatar prognosticates spectacular success.

Name: Elementalist
Card Text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Whenever you cast your first elemental spell each turn, your next spell of lower cost and a different element costs 0 mana this turn.
Type sentence: Your Avatar of wonder and awe.

Name: Enchantress
Card Text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Whenever you conjure an aura, you may have an aura you control become a minion with power equal to its mana cost this turn.
Type sentence: Your Avatar weaves magic and land together.

Name: Deathspeaker
Card Text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Summon any dead minion, resolve its genesis ability, then banish it.
Type sentence: Your Avatar turns death into dominion.

Name: Battlemage
Card Text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

When you attack, play or draw a site.
Type sentence: Your Avatar to win the battle and the war.

Name: Haunted Forest
Card Text: Genesis abilities of adjacent minions are also Deathrite abilities.
Type sentence: A Unique Site of smothering gloom.
